title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 13:21  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 13:21  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 13:23  
florinciu left at 13:23 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
penyaskito\_ - (13:25): sdumitriu, ok, now it seems that works, but when I access the wiki url it redirects me to 127.0.0.1:9080 (it's XEM, not XE)  
sdumitriu - (13:26): Yep, it's something known and easy to fix  
sdumitriu - (13:26): So, the idea is that you must add a wiki descriptor for the first wiki  
sburjan joined #xwiki at 13:26  
sdumitriu - (13:26): You can access it using the IP address if you have one  
sdumitriu - (13:27): Or you can disable virtual mode first (in xwiki.cfg, xwiki.virtual=0)  
penyaskito\_ - (13:35): sdumitriu, ok, and then import the xwiki-enterprise-manager.xar?  
sdumitriu - (13:35): Don't you have the main wiki content in the database already?  
penyaskito\_ - (13:35): sdumitriu, nop  
penyaskito\_ - (13:35): (sorry for being so noob, but I found XE docs very clear, but not the same with XEM ones)  
sdumitriu - (13:36): Yeah, XEM needs to be improved  
sdumitriu - (13:36): Well, import first, create descriptor later  
penyaskito\_ - (13:36): should I import xwiki-enterprise-wiki-2.4.xar first then?  
penyaskito\_ - (13:36): or the enterprise-manager one?  
sdumitriu - (13:36): enterprise-manager  
penyaskito\_ - (13:41): sdumitriu, yay, things look better now :)  
penyaskito\_ - (13:43): sdumitriu, how should I create a descriptor?  
sdumitriu - (13:43): Let me check if there's any good documentation  
penyaskito\_ - (13:44): sdumitriu, I'm following http://manager.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationMySQL, but there is no info on that  
sdumitriu - (13:45): You should have a document XWiki.XWikiServerXwiki  
sdumitriu - (13:45): Open it  
sdumitriu - (13:45): If it's there, edit and set the right domain name  
sdumitriu - (13:45): http://manager.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/EditWikiDescriptor  
sdumitriu - (13:45): http://manager.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/EditWikiAliases  
penyaskito\_ - (13:46): yep  
penyaskito\_ - (13:46): thanks sergiu :)  
sdumitriu - (13:46): Working now?  
sdumitriu - (13:47): Don't forget to re-enable virtual mode and restart  
penyaskito\_ - (13:53): I used the ip, no need of that :)  
penyaskito\_ - (13:53): Ok, now i have the setup done, and can create wikis  
penyaskito\_ - (13:53): once I create a wiki, I need to change DNS records, don't?  
sdumitriu - (13:53): Yes  
penyaskito\_ - (13:54): just an 'A' record with the host ip, don't? (I cannot test this now, so I want to be sure)  
sdumitriu - (13:54): Yes  
sdumitriu - (13:55): You can test locally  
sdumitriu - (13:55): Are you on Linux?  
marta1 left at 13:57 (Ping timeout: 265 seconds  
penyaskito\_ - (14:05): sdumitriu, yep :)  
penyaskito\_ - (14:05): editing /etc/hosts, don't?  
sdumitriu - (14:05): Yes  
penyaskito\_ - (14:07): ok  
penyaskito\_ - (14:08): just fyi, in windows you can do the same in C:/windows/system32/drivers/etc/hosts :)  
penyaskito\_ - (14:08): it works, thanks :)
